Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I'm new to the forums, and I assume it would be appropriate to ask my question here. So I was thinking for quite a while now to make some new planets using Krags Planet Factory mod. I already have some textures ready and all but I don't know where to go from there. Is there some kind of tool/mod that will help me make the new planets, or a video that will help me guide through the process?

Thanks,

Mike.
